      <jsitem location="inline" name="loadModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
    	var pageName = skuid.page.params.page;
	    if(pageName && pageName == 'AddDealsToPackage'){
	        var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('ConstructionCREApplication').createRow({});
	    }else{
    	    if(paramId){
        	    queryApplication(paramId);
        	}else{
        	    var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('ConstructionCREApplication').createRow({});   
        	}    
	    }
	    
	});
})(skuid);

function queryApplication(id){
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('ConstructionCREApplication');
    var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
    applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,id);
    skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){
       
    });
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fieldsRenderMode" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
    value = arguments[1];
var renderMode = skuid.page.params.mode;
if(renderMode && renderMode == "read"){
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].read(field, value);
}else{
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].edit(field, value);
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="getIncludedPageData" cachelocation="false" url="">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
var productRow = skuid.model.getModel('ConstructionCREProduct').getFirstRow();

if(applicationModel && applicationModel.data && applicationModel.data[0] && productRow){
    applicationModel.data[0]['genesis__CL_Product__c'] = productRow.Id;
}

var paymentStreamRows = skuid.model.getModel('PaymentStreamForCCREApp');
var result = {
    'genesis__Applications__c' : applicationModel,
    'genesis__Payment_Stream__c' : paymentStreamRows,
};

return result;</jsitem>
    </javascript>

</skuidpage>

Name: ConstructionHelp
skuid__Layout__c:
<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="yes" personalizationmode="server" showsidebar="false" showheader="false">
  <models/>
  <components>
    <wrapper uniqueid="sk-2SF_qm-79">
      <components>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2SKB6Z-2050" cssclass="help-title-wrapper">
          <contents><div class="help-section-header">Creating a Budget Record</div></contents>
        </template>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2SGAnF-102">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2SGF86-110" allowhtml="true" cssclass="help-text-wrapper">
                  <contents>To begin the construction budget process, users must first create the Budget Summary record.  Budget Summary fields are automatically presented to users on the Construction Dashboard:
    <ul>
        <li>Type - this is the type of construction project being undertaken (examples might include Office Building or Warehouse)</li>
        <li>Description - this is the description of the construction project</li>
        <li>Start Date - this is the date that the construction project is scheduled to begin</li>
        <li>End Date - this is the date that the construction project is scheduled to be completed</li>
        <li>Disbursement Type - this is the type of disbursement plan that is being applied to the project; applicable values include:
            <ul>
                <li>Standard - "standard" disbursement plans have been configured by the organization and will automatically create project milestones and disbursement schedules based on the type of construction project</li>
                <li>Progress-Based - "progress-based" disbursement plans assume that specific project milestones - or progress checkpoints - will be used to define the disbursement schedule</li>
            </ul>
        </li>
    </ul>
To enter values into these fields, user should hover over the specific field to reveal a <i class="fa fa-pencil"></i> icon. The user may, then, click on the <i class="fa fa-pencil"></i> icon to edit the field. Once all of the fields have been entered, the user must save the Budget Summary record by clicking the <i class="fa fa-floppy-o"></i> icon.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2SG3-k-93" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_StartScreen.png" cssclass="help-image-wrapper">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2SMoz9-2189" cssclass="help-title-wrapper">
          <contents><div class="help-section-header">Creating Milestones From Standard Disbursement Plan Templates</div></contents>
        </template>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2SMqYN-2194">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2SNJXZ-2224" allowhtml="true">
                  <contents>Once the Budget Summary has been created, the following Budget Milestones actions are enabled:
<ul>
    <li><i class="fa fa-files-o"></i> - If the Budget Summary's Disbursement Type value is 'Standard', users can create milestones from standard disbursement plan templates by clicking the <i class="fa fa-files-o"></i> action.</li>
    <li><i class="fa fa-plus"></i> - Users can manually create project milestones by clicking the <i class="fa fa-plus"></i> icon.</li>
</ul></contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2SN2HN-2213" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_BudgetSummary.png" cssclass="help-image-wrapper">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2W7pSX-97">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <grid uniqueid="sk-2WUS3z-1631">
                  <divisions>
                    <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
                      <components/>
                    </division>
                  </divisions>
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
                  </styles>
                </grid>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2W7ypo-112" allowhtml="true">
                  <contents>When users click the <i class="fa fa-files-o"></i> icon, the Disbursement Templates dialog is presented and users are enabled to select from a list of milestones associated with the type of construction project being undertaken.  To create milestones from this list of standard disbursement templates, users must click the checkbox next to each milestone (or click the checkbox above the list to select all milestones), and click the 'Generate Milestones' button.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2WIUjo-1059" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_DibsursementTemplates.png" cssclass="help-image-wrapper">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2WAbKE-702" cssclass="help-title-wrapper">
          <contents><div class="help-section-header">Modifying Milestones</div></contents>
        </template>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2WAccj-707">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2WAmS4-741" allowhtml="true">
                  <contents>After creating project milestones, users may need to update milestone details. To do this, users must double-click on the field they want to edit, enter or update the field value, and click the <i class="fa fa-floppy-o"></i> icon to save the Budget Milestone record. The following Budget Milestone fields can be modified:
<ul>
    <li>Description - this is the description of the construction project milestone.</li>
    <li>Start Date - this is the date the milestone is expected to begin.</li>
    <li>End Date - this is the date the milestone is expected to be completed.</li>
    <li>Inspection Lead Time - the is the number of days prior to the start date of the milestone that an inspection alert should be generated.</li>
</ul></contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2WIZ1X-1068" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_MilestoneUpdate.png" cssclass="help-image-wrapper">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2Wj3A2-2269" cssclass="help-title-wrapper">
          <contents><div class="help-section-header">Creating Construction Activities (Milestone Line Items)</div></contents>
        </template>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2Wj4D0-2274">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2Wj6WC-2286" allowhtml="true">
                  <contents>Once the construction project milestones have been created, users can continue building out the construction project plan by adding the individual construction activities to each milestone.  These milestone line items contain the specific construction activities being performed during the project milestone - such as obtaining a building permit, or installing windows - and the estimated cost of each construction activity.

To add construction activities to a specific project milestone, users must click the <i class="fa fa-tasks"></i> icon next to the applicable milestone to reveal the Construction Activity Line Items screen. From the Construction Activity Line Items screen, users must click the <i class="fa fa-plus"></i> icon to add new construction activity rows and begin the creation process.  For each construction activity, users must enter the following information:
<ul>
    <li>Description - this is the description of the construction activity.</li>
    <li>Amount - this is the estimated cost of the construction activity.</li>
</ul>
Once all applicable construction activities have been entered for a specific milestone, users must click the <i class="fa fa-floppy-o"></i> icon to save the construction activities (users must click the <i class="fa fa-close"></i> icon to cancel any actions). These steps should be repeated for each milestone.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2Wj61Q-2281" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_LineItems.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2WUNne-1627" cssclass="help-title-wrapper">
          <contents><div class="help-section-header">Generating a Disbursement Schedule</div></contents>
        </template>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2WUTe7-1636">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2WUX0e-1648" allowhtml="true">
                  <contents>Disbursement schedules for construction loans in CL Originate are generated from the milestones configured in the construction project plan. To generate a disbursement schedule, users must select the milestones they want to use to create each disbursement in the disbursement schedule by click the checkbox next to the applicable milestone (or users can click the checkbox above the milestones to select them all).

Once all applicable milestones have been selected, users must click the 'Generate Disbursement' Schedule button.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2WUW4u-1643" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_GenerateDisbursements.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2lTNwv-158">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2lTQdx-165">
                  <contents>Once the 'Generate Disbursement Schedule' button is clicked, the selected project milestone information will appear as disbursement line items on the Disbursement Schedule panel.  If needed, users are given an opportunity to make changes to the disbursement line items prior to submitting the disbursement schedule.  The following information is mapped from the Budget Milestones to the Disbursement Schedule:
<ul>
    <li>Description - this is the description of the disbursement line item; this value maps from the corresponding project milestone description.</li>
    <li>Schedule Date - this is the date that the disbursement is scheduled; this value maps from the start date of the corresponding project milestone.</li>
    <li>Inspection Lead Time - this is the period of time (in days) that users should be notified before a disbursement is required, given users the opportunity to perform any necessary site inspections before granting the disbursement; this value maps from the inspection lead time of the corresponding project milstone.</li>
    <li>Amount - this is the total amount of the disbursement; this value maps from the total line item amounts of the corresponding project milestone.</li>
</ul></contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2lTRLQ-169" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_DisbursementsEdit.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2lTbCO-183">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2lTeiP-196">
                  <contents>To commit the Disbursement Schedule, users must click the <i class="fa fa-floppy-o"></i> icon to save each line item record (or click the <i class="fa fa-close"></i> icon to cancel).

Users can add additional disbursement line items after the disbursement schedule has been generated by adding a new project line item, selecting it and clicking the 'Generate Disbursement Schedule' once more. Users may also edit existing disbursement line items by double-clicking on any specific record.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2lTcwE-190" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_DisbursementSchedule.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2lTDWy-148" cssclass="help-title-wrapper">
          <contents><div class="help-section-header">Managing Inspection Alerts</div></contents>
        </template>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2lT3-j-125">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2lT6UD-132">
                  <contents>Many organizations will want to inspect the progress of the construction project prior to issuing a disbursement.  Likewise, users will see inspection alerts on the Construction Dashboard when a project milestone has met the project lead time criteria and is ready for inspection.  In these cases, users will be presented with the Inspection Alert penal as well as the following message:

<i class="fa fa-exclamation-triangle"></i> The following project milestones need to be inspected. A delay in inspection could result in a delay in a scheduled disbursement.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2lTA2K-140" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_InspectionAlert.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2la-G0-2264">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2lb2zH-2283">
                  <contents>Once a site inspection has been performed, users can update the inspection alert by double-clicking the Inspection Status field to reveal status options.  Users must then select one of these options to clear the alert.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2lb13Y-2273" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_InspectionUpdate.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
        <grid uniqueid="sk-2la_NP-2259">
          <divisions>
            <division behavior="flex" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <template multiple="false" uniqueid="sk-2lb3kX-2287">
                  <contents>Any time an inspection alert status changes, users are prompted to enter notes and/or comments related to the site inspection.  In these cases, users should enter notes or comments into the Comments field and click the <i class="fa fa-floppy-o"></i> icon to save.</contents>
                </template>
              </components>
            </division>
            <division behavior="flex" verticalalign="top" minwidth="100px" ratio="1">
              <components>
                <image source="staticresource" uniqueid="sk-2lb1uQ-2278" cssclass="help-image-wrapper" resource="genesisExtn__ConstructionHelp" path="ConstructionHome_InspectionNotes.png">
                  <styles>
                    <styleitem type="itemsize"/>
                    <styleitem type="border"/>
                  </styles>
                </image>
              </components>
            </division>
          </divisions>
          <styles>
            <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
          </styles>
        </grid>
      </components>
      <styles>
        <styleitem type="background"/>
        <styleitem type="border"/>
        <styleitem type="size"/>
      </styles>
    </wrapper>
  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript/>
    <css>
      <cssitem location="staticresource" name="FontAwesomePack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="" filepath="font-awesome-4.6.3/css/font-awesome.css"/>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="TADcss" cachelocation="false">.help-title-wrapper {
    border-bottom: 3px solid #1cbdd4;

}

    margin-bottom: 12px;
}
.help-image-wrapper {
    margin-left: 16px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
.help-text-wrapper {
    margin-bottom: 28px;
}</cssitem>
    </css>
  </resources>
  <styles>
    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
  </styles>
</skuidpage>

  <resources>

    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="messageUtils.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="createPartiesForApps" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var selectedParty = skuid.model.getModel('SelectedParentParty').getFirstRow();
var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewlyCreatedPartyModel');
var selectedApplications = skuid.model.getModel('RemainingApplications').data;
if(selectedApplications){
    for (var index in selectedApplications) {
        console.log(index);
        if(selectedApplications[index] && selectedApplications[index].Id){
            var newRow = partyModel.createRow({
                additionalConditions: [
                    { field: 'clcommon__Account__c', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Account__c },
                    { field: 'clcommon__Account__r', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Account__r },
                    { field: 'genesis__Application__c', value: selectedApplications[index].Id },
                    { field: 'genesis__Application__r', value: selectedApplications[index] },
                    { field: 'genesis__Credit_Report__c', value: selectedParty.genesis__Credit_Report__c },
                    { field: 'genesis__Credit_Report__r', value: selectedParty.genesis__Credit_Report__r },
                    { field: 'genesis__Credit_Report__c', value: selectedParty.genesis__Credit_Report__c },
                    { field: 'genesis__Credit_Report__r', value: selectedParty.genesis__Credit_Report__r },
                    { field: 'clcommon__Type__c', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Type__c },
                    { field: 'clcommon__Type__r', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Type__r },
                    { field: 'clcommon__Signer_Capacity__c', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Signer_Capacity__c },
                    { field: 'clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__c', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__c },
                    { field: 'clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__r', value: selectedParty.clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__r },
                ]
            });    
        }
    }

    skuid.model.save([partyModel], { callback: function(result){
        if (result.totalsuccess) {
            // close the frame
            closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({iframeIds: []});
        } else {
            var pageTitle = $('#addPartyErrorTitle');
            var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
            editor.handleMessages(
                [
                   {
                      message: result.insertResults[0],
                      severity: 'ERROR'
                   },
                ]
            );
        }
    }});
}

</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css/>
  </resources>
  <styles>
    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
  </styles>
</skuidpage>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="getCreditReport" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NGParty');
var party = partyModel.data[0];
console.log(party);

var contactModel = skuid.model.getModel('PartiesContact');
var contact = contactModel.data[0];
console.log(contact);

var appId = party.genesis__Application__c;
var partyId = contact.Id;
var partyName = party.clcommon__Account__r.Name;

console.log(appId, partyId, partyName);

//callbacks.getCreditReport(appId, partyId, partyName);

var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {

    var editor = $('#errorPanelCreditPull ').data('object').editor;
    editor.messages.empty();
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
            message: message,
            severity: severity.toUpperCase()
        }
    ]);

    return false;
};


var result = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidCreditPullCtrl', 'doCreditPullForParty', {
                applicationId: appId,
                contactId: partyId
            });

if (result && result == 'Credit Pull Successful') {
    window.location.reload(true);
} else {
    var err = 'Cannot get credit report. ' + result;
    return displayMessage(err, 'ERROR');
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="creditScoreJS" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        calculateColor();
        adjustMark();
    });
})(skuid);


function adjustMark() {
    var width = $('.credit-score-bar').width();
    var score = parseInt($('.credit-score-number').text());
    var left = width * (score - 300) / (850 - 300);
    $('.credit-score-number').css('left', (left - $('.credit-score-number').outerWidth() / 2) + 'px');
    $('.credit-score-mark').css('left', (left - 3) + 'px');
    $('.credit-score-mark-top').css('left', (left - 7) + 'px');
    return score;
}

function calculateColor() {
    var score = parseInt($('.credit-score-bg').text());
    var low = 300, middle = 575, high = 850;
    var lowRed = 230, middleRed = 255, highRed = 72;
    var lowGreen = 60, middleGreen = 162, highGreen = 206;
    var lowBlue = 0, middleBlue = 29, highBlue = 148;

    var alpha, red, green, blue;

    if (score < middle) {
        alpha = (score - low) / (middle - low);
        red = Math.floor(alpha * middleRed + (1 - alpha) * lowRed);
        green = Math.floor(alpha * middleGreen + (1 - alpha) * lowGreen);
        blue = Math.floor(alpha * middleBlue + (1 - alpha) * lowBlue);
    } else {
        alpha = (score - middle) / (high - middle);
        red = Math.floor(alpha * highRed + (1 - alpha) * middleRed);
        green = Math.floor(alpha * highGreen + (1 - alpha) * middleGreen);
        blue = Math.floor(alpha * highBlue + (1 - alpha) * middleBlue);
    }

    var color = 'rgb(' + red + ', ' + green + ', ' + blue + ')';
    $('.credit-score-bg').css('background-color', color);
}</jsitem>

</jsitem>
            <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RenderCreditReportColumn" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
    value = arguments[1],
    $ = skuid.$;

var url = field.row.ints__Credit_Report_Attachment__c;
var reportId = url.substring(url.lastIndexOf('/')+1);

field.element.html('<a>' + value + ' <i class="fa fa-expand"></i></a>');

field.element.on('click', function(evt) {
    openPreviewDialog(reportId);
    return false;
});

function openPreviewDialog(reportId) {
    var dialogHeight = $(window).height();
    var dialogWidth = $(window).width();

    var iframe = $('<iframe width="100%" height="100%" frameBorder="0"/>');
    iframe.attr('src', '/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=' + reportId);

    $(document.body).append($('<div id="document-preview-dialog"></div>').append(iframe));

    $('#document-preview-dialog').dialog({
        modal: true,
        title: 'Credit Report',
        width: dialogWidth,
        height: dialogHeight,
        draggable: false,
        resizable: false,
        close: function(evt, ui) {
            $(document.body).find('#document-preview-dialog').remove();
        }
    });
}</jsitem>
        </javascript>
        <css>
            <cssitem location="staticresource" name="CLSStyleSheetPack" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="cls-dialog.css"/>

<p><span style="font-size:14px;"><code><span style="font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,Times,serif;">Default product configuration packs include standard configurations for various loan contexts&nbsp; including commercial and consumer loan&nbsp; origination for the different regions supported by&nbsp; &nbsp; CL Originate. Click the install default pack icon&nbsp; before the applicable default product configuration&nbsp; pack to initiate installation of the default product&nbsp; settings.</span></code></span></p>

        <javascript>
            <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="InstallProductConfig" cachelocation="false" url="">
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;
var header = skuid.model.getModel('DataLoaderHeader');
var result;
var field  = arguments[0];
value = arguments[1],
 row = params.row;
var arg = new Object();
arg.dataLoaderHeaderName = row.Name;
sforce.apex.execute('genesis.DataLoader','installDefaultData',arg);
var query = "SELECT Id,ints__Installed__c FROM ints__Data_Loader_Header__c WHERE Name =\'" + row.Name + "\'" + "LIMIT 1"; 
var records = sforce.connection.query(query);
var recordsArr = records.getArray('records');
if(recordsArr !== null){
var isInstalled = recordsArr[0].ints__Installed__c;
if(isInstalled == 'false'){
result = 'Installation failed. Please check logs for further details.';
} else {
result = 'Success';
}
}
alert(result);
</jsitem>
            <jsitem location="external" name="ApexAJAX" cachelocation="false" url=" /soap/ajax/29.0/apex.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
        <jsitem location="external" name="ConnectionJS" cachelocation="false" url="/soap/ajax/24.0/connection.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
</javascript>

        <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
    </styles>
</skuidpage>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="UpdateParty" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

var pageTitle = $('#EditPartyTitlePanel');
var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;


/*
    Handle error messages

    For printing error messages: use return functionName() as syntax
    For printing non error(INFO,WARNING) messages: use functionName() as syntax without any 'return' preceding function name
*/
var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {

    if(severity == 'ERROR') {
        console.log('error');
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: message,
                severity: severity.toUpperCase()
            }
        ]);

        return false;
    } else {
        console.log('info');
        editor.handleMessages([
            {
                message: message,
                severity: severity.toUpperCase()
            }
        ]);

        //return true;
    }
};

var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGParty');
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];

var newAccountModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGPartyAccount');
var newAccountRow = newAccountModel.data[0];

var newContactModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGPartyContact');
var newContactRow = newContactModel.data[0];

var businessInfoModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGAccountBusinessInfo');
var businessInfoRow = businessInfoModel.data[0];

var collateralOwnerModel = skuid.model.getModel('EditNGCollateralOwner');
var collData = [];
collateralOwnerModel.data.forEach(function (colDataObj){
    if(!collateralOwnerModel.isRowMarkedForDeletion(colDataObj) && colDataObj.clcommon__Collateral__c){
        collData.push(colDataObj);
    }
});
collateralOwnerModel.data = collData;



if(!newPartyRow.clcommon__Type__c){
    return displayMessage('Select Party Type for Party.','ERROR');
}

var partyArgs = {};
if(newContactRow && newContactRow.LastName){
    partyArgs[0] = newContactModel;

    if(newContactRow.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c === undefined || newContactRow.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c === '') {
        return displayMessage('Select Legal Entity Type for Contact.','ERROR');
    }
}else{
    partyArgs[0] = null;
}
if(newAccountRow && newAccountRow.Name){
    partyArgs[1] = newAccountModel;

    if(newAccountRow.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c === undefined || newAccountRow.clcommon__Legal_Entity_Type__c === '') {
        return displayMessage('Select Legal Entity Type for Account.','ERROR');
    }
}else{
    partyArgs[1] = null;
}


var bModel = businessInfoModel;
if (Object.keys(businessInfoModel.data[0]).length <= 2){
    bModel = null;
}

var res = saveParty(newPartyModel,partyArgs[0],partyArgs[1],bModel,collateralOwnerModel);
var resObj = JSON.parse(res);
if(resObj.status == 'SUCCESS'){
    displayMessage('Record is successfully saved!','INFO');
    closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({iframeIds: ['deal-dashboard-iframe,relationship-iframe']});
}else{
    $("#PartySaveButton").button('enable');
    return displayMessage(resObj.errorMessage,'ERROR');

}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="CloseDialog" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;

closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh();</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="CreateNewAdhoc" cachelocation="false">/**
*  Purpose: Used for setting paramemters for displaying create new ad hoc fee and hiding others
*  Where: create new Ad-hoc button
*
* @name  createNewAdhoc.js
* @author  Ashish Kumar Singh
* @version 1.0
* @since   06-18-2016
*/


//a DOM element that Skuid will add, in place, into the parent / container component in which you've placed this custom component.
//Get a reference to this element
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;    //declares that we are using skuid custom jQuery

//highlighting the selected button
$('#newCreateAdhocid').addClass('selected-btn');
$('#newCreateTemplateid').removeClass('selected-btn');
$('#showExistingChargesId').removeClass('selected-btn');

var newChargeModel = skuid.model.getModel('FeeCharge');
var newChargeRow = newChargeModel.data[0];

var newFeeModel = skuid.model.getModel('FeeDefModel');
var newFeeRow = newFeeModel.data[0];

//setting paramemts for hiding and displaying editors for creating/showing fee
if(!newChargeRow){
    var newChargeRow = newChargeModel.createRow({
        additionalConditions: [
            { field: 'NewCreateAdhoc', value:true },
            { field: 'NewCreateTemplate', value: false },
            { field: 'viewExisting', value: false },
        ]
    });

   skuid.component.getById('tableExistingId').element.hide();

}else{
    newChargeModel.updateRow(newChargeRow ,
                        { NewCreateAdhoc : true ,
                          NewCreateTemplate : false,
                          viewExisting:false });

   skuid.component.getById('tableExistingId').element.show();

}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="CreateNewTemplate" cachelocation="false">/**

*/

//Get a reference to this element
var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;    //declares that we are using skuid custom jQuery

//highlighting the selected button
$('#newCreateAdhocid').removeClass('selected-btn');

$('#showExistingChargesId').removeClass('selected-btn');

var newChargeModel = skuid.model.getModel('FeeCharge');
var newChargeRow = newChargeModel.data[0];

var newFeeModel = skuid.model.getModel('FeeDefModel');

</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="createTemplateSnippet" cachelocation="false">/**
*  Purpose: Used for creating rows in memory to make it editable on step 2
*  Where: apply charge button in wizard
*
* @name  createTemplateSnippet.js
* @author  Ashish Kumar Singh
* @version 1.0
* @since   06-18-2016
*/



var $ = skuid.$,
action = arguments[0].action,
list = arguments[0].list,
model = arguments[0].model,
selectedItems = list.getSelectedItems();

var editor = $('#errorDisplayPopupFees ').data('object').editor;

// Handle error messages
var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {

    editor.handleMessages([
        {
            message: message,
            severity: severity.toUpperCase()
        }
    ]);

    return false;
};

if(!selectedItems || selectedItems.length===0){
    return displayMessage('Please select a row ', 'ERROR');
}

var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];

var rowToupdates =[];
var rowUpdates ={};

    $.each( selectedItems,function( i, item ){
        rowUpdates ={};
        var row = item.row;
        $.each( row,function( f, val ){
            if ((f == 'clcommon__Amount__c')) {
                rowUpdates['genesis__Amount__c'] = val;

            }

            if ((f == 'Name')) {
                rowUpdates['Name'] = val;
            }

            if ((f == 'Id')) {
                rowUpdates['clcommon__Fee_Definition__c'] = val;
            }

            if ((f == 'clcommon__Type__c')) {
                rowUpdates['clcommon__Type__c'] = val;
            }

        });

        rowToupdates.push(rowUpdates);


    });


var newChargeModel = skuid.model.getModel('FeeChargeClone2');
newChargeModel.cancel();
var newChargeRow = newChargeModel.data[0];


$.each( rowToupdates,function( i, item ){
    newChargeModel.createRow( {
        additionalConditions: [

            { field :'clcommon__Original_Amount__c',value :item.genesis__Amount__c },
            { field :'clcommon__Fee_Definition__c',value :item.clcommon__Fee_Definition__c },
            {field : 'genesis__Application__c',value : skuid.page.params.id},
            {field : 'clcommon__Type__c',value : item.clcommon__Type__c}
        ]});

});


skuid.component.getById('saveFeeInPopUp').element.show();
skuid.component.getById('cancelFeeInPopup').element.show();

currentStep.navigate('step2');</jsitem>

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="FinancialStatement_BeautifyTable" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var templateModel = skuid.model.getModel('TemplateDetails');
        $('.financial-statement-table').each(
            function(tableIndex, table) {
                $(table).find('table tbody tr').each(
                    function(index, element) {
                        if(templateModel.data[index]){
                            var level = templateModel.data[index].clcommon__Level__c;
                            if(level) {
                                $(element).attr('level', level.split('.').length);
                            } else {
                                $(element).attr('level', 0);    
                            }
                            $(element).attr('row-type', templateModel.data[index].clcommon__Type__c);
                        }
                    }
                )
            }
        )
        
        $(window.document.body).find('a').each(function(index, link) {
    		$(link).attr('target', '_blank');
    	});
	});
})(skuid);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="FinancialStatement_EditHandler" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var statementModel = skuid.model.getModel('FSHeader');
var statementHeaders = statementModel.data;
if (!$('#edit-button + #edit-dropdown').length) {
    showDropdown();
} else {
    closeDropdown();
}

function showDropdown() {
    var dropdownList = $('<div/>', {
        id: 'edit-dropdown'
    }).css('position', 'absolute').css('right', '10px').css('border', '1px solid #7f7f7f').css('z-index', 5);
    statementHeaders.forEach(function(element) {
        var entry = $('<div>Statement ' + element.Name + '</div>').css('padding-top', '6px').css('padding-bottom', '6px').css('padding-left', '10px').css('padding-right', '10px').css('cursor', 'pointer');
        entry.click(function() {
            openEditIframe(element.Id)
        });
        dropdownList.append(entry);
    });

    $('#edit-button').after(dropdownList);
}

function closeDropdown() {
    $('#edit-button + #edit-dropdown').remove();
}

function openEditIframe(statementId) {
    closeDropdown();
    var overlay = $('<div id="edit-statement-overlay"></div>').css({
        position: 'fixed',
        top: 0,
        bottom: 0,
        left: 0,
        right: 0,
    }).css("z-index", 100).css("background-color", "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3");
    var dialog = $('<div id="edit-statement-dialog"></div>').css("margin-top", "30px").css("margin-bottom", "30px").css("margin-left", '5%').css("margin-right", "5%").css("height", "calc(100% - 60px)");
    var closeButton = $('<div></div>').addClass('fa fa-times').css({
        position: 'absolute',
        top: '25px',
        left: '94%',
        height: '15px',
        width: '15px',
        color: '#ffffff'
    }).click(function() {
        closeEditIframe();
    });
    var src = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=StatementDetails&id=' + statementId + '&type=' + skuid.page.params.type + '&editmode=true';
    var iframe = $('<iframe width="100%" height="100%" frameBorder="0" style="background: #ffffff; padding-top: 20px; padding-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px; padding-bottom: 7px;"/>');
    iframe.attr('src', src);
    
    dialog.append(iframe).append(closeButton);
    overlay.append(dialog);
	
    $(document.body).append(overlay);
}

function closeEditIframe() {
    $('#edit-statement-overlay').remove();
}

window.addEventListener('message', function(evt) {
    if(evt.data.type == 'requery-statement-headers'){
        $.when(statementModel.updateData()).then(function(){
           closeEditIframe();
        });
    } else if(evt.data.type == 'close-edit-statement-headers'){
         closeEditIframe();
    }
});
</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css>

      <jsitem location="inline" name="UpdateSobjectTypeOnLoad" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    // determine sobject type and prefix
	    if(skuid.page.params.id){
	        getDataFromId();
	    } else if(skuid.page.params.sobjecttype){
	        getDataFromSobjectType();
	    } else {
	        skuid.page.params.sobjecttype = 'genesis__Applications__c';
	        getDataFromSobjectType();
	    }
	    // show button labels as icons
	    showIconicBtnLabelAsTooltip();
	});

    // determine sobject type and prefix from param id
    function getDataFromId(){
        var sobjectPrefix = skuid.page.params.id.substring(0,3);
        var sobjectType = getSobjectType(sobjectPrefix);
        updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix);
    }

    // determine sobject type and prefix from param sobjecttype
    function getDataFromSobjectType(){
        var sobjectType = skuid.page.params.sobjecttype;
        var sobjectPrefix = getSobjectPrefix(sobjectType);
        updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix);
    }
	
	//create a new row in model to set sobject type and prefix
    function updateUIModel(sobjectType, sobjectPrefix){
        skuid.$M("GH_AnySObjectModel").createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'SObjectType', value: sobjectType},
                { field: 'Prefix', value: sobjectPrefix},
            ], doAppend: true
        });
    }
    
	// get sobject name from sobject prefix
	function getSobjectType(prefix) {
        var selectedObjectType;
        // skuid gets object prefix for any polymorphic fields like parentid field on attachment
        skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId").referenceTo.forEach(function(relatedObject){
            if(relatedObject.keyPrefix == prefix){
                selectedObjectType = relatedObject.objectName;
                return false;
            }
        });
        return selectedObjectType;
    }

    // get sobject prefix from sobject type
	function getSobjectPrefix(sobjectType) {
        var prefix;
        // skuid gets object prefix for any polymorphic fields like parentid field on attachment
        skuid.$M("GH_AnyAttachmentModel").getField("ParentId").referenceTo.forEach(function(relatedObject){
            if(relatedObject.objectName == sobjectType){
                prefix = relatedObject.keyPrefix;
                return false;
            }
        });
        return prefix;
    }

})(skuid);</jsitem>

    $('#manage-stages').webuiPopover({
	    trigger: 'manual',
	    type : 'iframe',
	    url: '/apex/skuid__ui?page=NGTaskList&id=' + sessionStorage.getItem('selectApplicationId'),
	    width: '620px',
	    placement: 'bottom-left',

	$('#manage-stages').webuiPopover('show');
}</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inline" name="onLoad" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        showIconicBtnLabelAsTooltip();
        
        var getdisplayVfTempSnippet = skuid.snippet.getSnippet('searchIncludePanel');
        var res = getdisplayVfTempSnippet();
        console.log($('#dynamicPageInclude').is(":visible"));
        console.log(' res = ',res,$('#dynamicPageInclude:visible').length);
        if(res === true) {
            skuid.component.getById('vfpage-iframeid-template').element.hide();
        } else {
            skuid.component.getById('vfpage-iframeid-template').element.show();
        }
        
        
        var launchpadAppSubModel = skuid.model.getModel('Launchpad_Apps_Subscription');
        var launchpadAppSubRow = launchpadAppSubModel.data;
        var appSubscribedLength = launchpadAppSubRow.length;
        
        var ammortizedWidth = appSubscribedLength*14;
        if(ammortizedWidth >= 100 || appSubscribedLength >= 7) {
            ammortizedWidth =100;
        }
        
        $("#launchpadDeckQueue").width(ammortizedWidth+'%');
        
        var proportionateSizeOfEachAppContainer;
        var actualWidthOfEachAppContainer;
        var actualWidthOfEachAppContainerRounded;
        
        if(ammortizedWidth === 100) {
            proportionateSizeOfEachAppContainer = ammortizedWidth/(appSubscribedLength);
            actualWidthOfEachAppContainer = proportionateSizeOfEachAppContainer - 2;
            actualWidthOfEachAppContainerRounded = parseFloat(actualWidthOfEachAppContainer).toFixed(1);
            
            $('#launchpadDeckQueue .nx-item.sk-grid-division.sk-card').css({
                'width': actualWidthOfEachAppContainerRounded+'%',
                'height': 'auto',
                'margin-right': '10px'
            });
            
        } else {
            proportionateSizeOfEachAppContainer = ammortizedWidth/(appSubscribedLength-1);
            actualWidthOfEachAppContainer = proportionateSizeOfEachAppContainer - 2;
            actualWidthOfEachAppContainerRounded = parseFloat(actualWidthOfEachAppContainer).toFixed(1);
            
            $('#launchpadDeckQueue .nx-item.sk-grid-division.sk-card').css({
                'width': actualWidthOfEachAppContainerRounded+'%',
                'height': 'auto',
                'margin-right': '20px'
            });
        }     
    });
})(skuid);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="handleAppQueueTrigger" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;

var editor;

// Handle error messages
var displayMessage = function (message, severity) {
    editor = $('#Launchpad_errorPanel').data('object').editor;
    // editor.messages.empty(); 
    editor.handleMessages([
        {
            message: message,
            severity: severity.toUpperCase()
        }
    ]);
    
    // return false;
};


var LoanRecordType = skuid.model.getModel('Launchpad_RecordType');
var LoanRecordTypeRow = LoanRecordType.data[0];
console.log('LoanRecordType ',LoanRecordType);
console.log('LoanRecordTypeRow ',LoanRecordTypeRow);

var launchpadAppModel = skuid.model.getModel('Launchpad_Apps');
var laCondition = launchpadAppModel.getConditionByName('Launchpad_App_Id');
launchpadAppModel.setCondition(laCondition, params.row.clcommon__Launchpad_App__c);
launchpadAppModel.activateCondition(laCondition);

skuid.model.updateData([launchpadAppModel],function(){ 
    var rowUpdates = launchpadAppModel.data[0];
    
    /* assign names to variables */ 
    var sourceName = rowUpdates.clcommon__Content_Source__c;
    var sourceType = rowUpdates.clcommon__Content_Source_Type__c;
    var behaviour = rowUpdates.clcommon__Behavior__c;

    var pageInclude = skuid.$('#dynamicPageInclude').data('object');
    
    /* check source type to append url prefix to pages*/
    if(sourceType !== undefined) {
        switch (sourceType) {
            case 'Skuid Page'      : loadSkuidPage(sourceName, pageInclude, behaviour);
                                     break;
            case 'Visualforce Page': loadVisualforcePage(sourceName, behaviour);
                                     break;
            case 'Salesforce Url'  : loadSalesforceUrl(sourceName, behaviour);
                                     break; 
            default                : 
                                    var err = 'Source type is not suppotred. Pl. select source type from available picklist';
                                    throwError(err);
        }
    }
     
});

function loadSkuidPage(sourceName, pageInclude, behaviour) {
   
    if(sourceName !== undefined && sourceName !== null && sourceName !== '') {
        try {
            
            switch (behaviour) {
                case 'Display in launchpad detail view'      : /* load  in pageInclude and hide iframe if open */
                                                    skuid.component.getById('dynamicPageInclude').element.show();
                                                    skuid.component.getById('vfpage-iframeid-template').element.hide();
                                                    pageInclude.pagename = sourceName;
                                                    if(sourceName === 'CreateNewApplication') {
                                                        var err = 'Create New Loan Application is not supported in launchpad detail view. Select other behavior from available picklist';
                                                        throwError(err);
                                                        return false;
                                                        // pageInclude.querystring = '?mode=edit&RecordType=edit'; 
                                                    }
                                                    console.log('pageInclude ',pageInclude);
                                                    pageInclude.load(function(){
                                                    });
                                                    break;
                case 'Display in new tab'           : 
                                                    if(sourceName === 'CreateNewApplication') {
                                                        console.log('sourceName ===  CreateNewApplication');
                                                        var urlTab = "/apex/skuid__ui?page=" +sourceName + '&RecordType=' + LoanRecordTypeRow.Id + '&mode=edit';
                                                    } else {
                                                        var urlTab = "/apex/skuid__ui?page=" +sourceName;
                                                    
                                                    }
                                                    window.open(urlTab, '_blank');
                                                    
                                                    break;
                case 'Display in new window'        : 
                                                    if(sourceName === 'CreateNewApplication') {
                                                        console.log('sourceName ===  CreateNewApplication');
                                                        var urlTab = "/apex/skuid__ui?page=" +sourceName + '&RecordType=' + LoanRecordTypeRow.Id + '&mode=edit';;
                                                    } else {
                                                        var urlWin = "/apex/skuid__ui?page=" +sourceName;
                                                    }
                                                    
                                                    window.open(urlWin, '_blank', 'width=' + screen.width + ',height=' + screen.height);
                                                    break; 
                default                           : 
                                                    var err = 'Source type ' + behaviour +' is not supported. Select source type from available picklist';
                                                    throwError(err);
            }
        } catch(err) {
            /* err.message */
            throwError(err.message);
        }
        
        
    } else {
        /*throw error page name missing */
        throwError('Source Name is empty. Provide a non-empty valid source name');
    }
    
    
}

function loadVisualforcePage(sourceName, behaviour) {
    
    if(sourceName !== undefined && sourceName !== null && sourceName !== '') {
        try {
            
            switch (behaviour) {
                case 'Display in launchpad detail view'      : /* display in iframe and hide pageinclude if open */
                                                    // var userRecord = skuid.model.getModel('Launchpad_User');
                                                    // var model = userRecord.getFirstRow();
                                                    // var userId = model.Id;
                                                    skuid.component.getById('vfpage-iframeid-template').element.show();
                                                    skuid.component.getById('dynamicPageInclude').element.hide();
                                                    var height = $('#launchpad-visulaforce-iframe').attr('height');
                                                    height = '100%';
                                                    var url = $('#launchpad-visulaforce-iframe').attr('src');
                                                    url = '';
                                                    url += '/apex/'+sourceName + '?isdtp=nv';  //mn + '&id=' + userId;
                                                    $('#launchpad-visulaforce-iframe').attr('src', url);
                                                    $('#launchpad-visulaforce-iframe').attr('height', height);
                                                    $('#launchpad-visulaforce-iframe').hide();
                                                    
                                                    $('#launchpad-visulaforce-iframe').on('load', function() {
                                                        $("#launchpad-visulaforce-iframe").show();
                                                    });
                                                    break;
                case 'Display in new tab'                    : var urlTab = "/apex/"+sourceName;
                                                    window.open(urlTab, '_blank');
                                                    break;
                case 'Display in new window'                 : var urlWin = "/apex/"+sourceName;
                                                    window.open(urlWin, '_blank', 'width=' + screen.width + ',height=' + screen.height);
                                                    break; 
                default                           : 
                                                    var err = 'Source type ' + behaviour +' is not supported. Select source type from available picklist';
                                                    throwError(err);
            }
        } catch(err) {
            /* err.message */
            throwError(err.message);
        }
        
        
    } else {
        /*throw error page name missing */
        throwError('Source Name is empty. Provide a non-empty valid source name');
    }
    
}

function loadSalesforceUrl(sourceName, behaviour) {
   
    if(sourceName !== undefined && sourceName !== null && sourceName !== '') {
        try {
            
            switch (behaviour) {
                case 'Display in launchpad detail view'      : /* display in iframe and hide pageinclude if open */
                                                    var err = 'Source type is not suppotred for URLs. Select "open in new tab/ new window" as source type from available picklist for this app';
                                                    throwError(err);
                                                    break;
                case 'Display in new tab'                    : var urlTab = "/"+sourceName;
                                                    window.open(urlTab, '_blank');
                                                    break;
                case 'Display in new window'                 : var urlWin = "/"+sourceName;
                                                    window.open(urlWin, '_blank', 'width=' + screen.width + ',height=' + screen.height);
                                                    break; 
                default                           : 
                                                    var err = 'Source type ' + behaviour +' is not supported. Select source type from available picklist';
                                                    throwError(err);
            }
        } catch(err) {
            /* err.message */
            throwError(err.message);
        }
        
        
    } else {
        /*throw error page name missing */
        throwError('Source Name is empty. Provide a non-empty valid source name');
    }
}

function throwError(err) {
    /* call error handler */
    return displayMessage(err,'ERROR');
}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="saveSubscription" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;


var userModel = skuid.model.getModel('LaunchPadAppSubscription_User');
var userRow = userModel.data[0];

var appSubscriptionModel = skuid.model.getModel('LaunchPadAppSubscription_LaunchpadUserAppSubscription');
var appSubsRow = appSubscriptionModel.data;

var appUserSubsList = [];
var appToRecordIdMap = {};
$.each(appSubsRow,function( i, row ){
    appUserSubsList.push(row.clcommon__Launchpad_App__c);
    appToRecordIdMap[row.clcommon__Launchpad_App__c] = row.Id;
      
});    




var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('LaunchPadAppSubscription_LaunchpadApp');
var appRow = appModel.data;

$.each(appRow,function( i, row ){
    if (appModel.getFieldValue(row,'IsAppSubscribed')===true) {
        if(appUserSubsList.indexOf(row.Id) == -1) {
            appSubscriptionModel.createRow({
                additionalConditions: [
                    {field: 'clcommon__Launchpad_App__c', value: row.Id},
                    {field : 'clcommon__User__c', value: userRow.Id}
                ]
            });
        }
    } else {
        if(appUserSubsList.indexOf(row.Id) != -1) {
            appSubscriptionModel.deleteRow(appToRecordIdMap[row.Id]);
        }
    }
      
});  

appSubscriptionModel.save();

window.location.reload();

      <jsitem location="inline" name="onLoad" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
    var $ = skuid.$;
    $(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
        var appSubscriptionModel = skuid.model.getModel('LaunchPadAppSubscription_LaunchpadUserAppSubscription');
        var appSubsRow = appSubscriptionModel.data;
        
        var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('LaunchPadAppSubscription_LaunchpadApp');
        var appRow = appModel.data;
        var appUserSubsList= [];
        $.each(appSubsRow,function( i, row ){
            appUserSubsList.push(row.clcommon__Launchpad_App__c);
               
        });
        
        $.each(appRow,function( i, row ){
            if(appUserSubsList.indexOf(row.Id) != -1) {
                 appModel.updateRow(row , { 'IsAppSubscribed' : true });
            }
               
        });  

    });
})(skuid);</jsitem>

    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="commonUtils.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="MHA_GenerateViewData" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    // create relationship view table
	    var relationView = skuid.model.getModel('MHA_RelationshipView');
		relationView.data = [];
		
		var relations = skuid.model.getModel('MHA_RelationshipsAsEntity').data;
		for (i = 0; i < relations.length; i++) { 
            relationView.createRow({
                additionalConditions: [
                    { field: 'AccountName', value:relations[i].clcommon__Related_Entity__r.Name },
                    { field: 'RelationName', value:relations[i].clcommon__Related_Entity_Role__c },
                    { field: 'AccountId', value:relations[i].clcommon__Related_Entity__c}
                ]
            });   
        }
        
        var relatedRelations = skuid.model.getModel('MHA_RelationshipsAsRelatedEntity').data;
        for (i = 0; i < relatedRelations.length; i++) { 
            relationView.createRow({
                additionalConditions: [
                    { field: 'AccountName', value:relatedRelations[i].clcommon__Entity__r.Name },
                    { field: 'RelationName', value:relatedRelations[i].clcommon__Entity_Role__c },
                    { field: 'AccountId', value:relatedRelations[i].clcommon__Entity__c}
                ]
            });   
        }
        
        if(relationView.data.length > 0){
            // sort the records
            relationView.data.sort(function(a, b){return a.AccountName - b.AccountName});
            
            // need to save else skuid shows unsaved changes css
            skuid.model.save([relationView], {callback: function(result){
                // get first relationship details
                querySelectedAccount(relationView.data[0].AccountId);
            }});
        }
        
        // show button label as tooltip
        showIconicBtnLabelAsTooltip();
	});
	// click the first div
})(skuid)

function querySelectedAccount(selectedAccountId){
    if(selectedAccountId){
        var selectedAccModel = skuid.model.getModel('MHA_SelectedRelationshipAccount');
        var accountIdCondition = selectedAccModel.getConditionByName('AccountId');
        selectedAccModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition, selectedAccountId);
        skuid.model.updateData([selectedAccModel],function(){
            // success
            highlightSelectedRow(selectedAccountId);
        });
    }
}

function highlightSelectedRow(rowId){
    // remove highlighted row css
    $('.account-relationships').find('table tbody tr').each(
        function(index, element) {
            $(element).removeClass("highlighted-row");  
        }                
    )
    $('.account-relationships table tr').each(
        function(index, element) {
            $(element).find('div #' + rowId).each(
                function(i, e) {
                    $(element).addClass('highlighted-row');      
                }   
            )
        } 
    )
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="OpenAddNewRelationshipDialog" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var title = 'Add Member';
var skuidPage = 'AddNewRelationship';
var iframeUrl = '/apex/skuid__ui?page=' + skuidPage + '&id=' + skuid.model.getModel('MHA_SelectedAccount').getFirstRow().Id;
openTopLevelDialog({
    title: title,
    iframeUrl: iframeUrl
});</jsitem>

</cssitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="DeleteAttachment" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

			+ ', <strong>\'' + documentName + '\'</strong>?</p>';

};

      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesis" filepath="commonUtils.js">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="addDocuments" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var selectedIds = $.map(params.list.getSelectedItems(), function(item) {
    return item.row.Id;
});

var id = getIdfromUrl(window.location.search.substring(1));

var message = {
    type: 'action-document-add',
    documentCategoryId: id,
    documentIds: selectedIds
};

window.parent.postMessage(message, '*');

function getIdfromUrl(query) {
    var id;
	$.each(query.split('&'), function(index, value) {
		var pair = value.split('=');
		if (pair[0] === 'id') {
			id = pair[1];
		}
	});
	return id;
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SelectUploadedFiles" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

var allAttachments = params.model.data;
var origAttachments = getCurrentAttachments();

var origIds = $.map(origAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return attachment.Id;
});

var newAttachments = $.grep(allAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return $.inArray(attachment.Id, origIds) == -1;
});

var newIds = $.map(newAttachments, function(attachment, i) {
    return attachment.Id;
});

var attachmentTable = skuid.$('#attachment-table').data('object');

$.each(newIds, function(index, id) {
    var checkbox = $(attachmentTable.list.renderedItems[id].element).find('input[type=checkbox]');
    if (!checkbox.attr('checked')) {
        checkbox.trigger('click');
    }
});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesis" filepath="attachmentsComponent.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RenderFileName" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],

field.element.text(value);</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inline" name="loadModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	    var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
    	var pageName = skuid.page.params.page;
	    if(pageName && pageName == 'AddDealsToPackage'){
	        var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('EquipmentCSApplication').createRow({});   
	    }else{
    	    if(paramId){
        	    queryApplication(paramId);
        	}else{
        	    var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('EquipmentCSApplication').createRow({});   
        	}    
	    }
    	
	});
})(skuid);

function queryApplication(id){
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('EquipmentCSApplication');
    var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
    applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,id);
    
    skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){
        
    });
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fieldsRenderMode" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
    value = arguments[1];
var renderMode = skuid.page.params.mode;
if(renderMode && renderMode == "read"){
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].read(field, value);
}else{
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].edit(field, value);
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="getIncludedPageData" cachelocation="false" url="">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var productRow = skuid.model.getModel('EquipmentCSProduct').getFirstRow();	
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('EquipmentCSApplication');
if(applicationModel && applicationModel.data && applicationModel.data[0] && productRow){
    applicationModel.data[0].genesis__CL_Product__c = productRow.Id;
}
var paymentStreamRows = skuid.model.getModel('PaymentStreamForECSApp');

var result = {
    'genesis__Applications__c' : applicationModel,
    'genesis__Payment_Stream__c' : paymentStreamRows,
};

return result;

</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css/>
  </resources>
  <styles>
    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
  </styles>
</skuidpage>

<skuidpage unsavedchangeswarning="" showsidebar="false" showheader="false" personalizationmode="server">
  <models>

    </model>
    <model id="newTask" limit="1" query="false" createrowifnonefound="true" sobject="Task" doclone="" type="" adapter="salesforce">
      <fields>
        <field id="genesis__Application__c"/>
        <field id="genesis__Application__r.Name"/>
        <field id="OwnerId"/>
        <field id="Owner.Name"/>
        <field id="genesis__Completion_Mandatory__c"/>
        <field id="Description"/>
        <field id="Subject"/>
        <field id="Type"/>
        <field id="Priority"/>
        <field id="ActivityDate"/>
        <field id="SendUserNotificationEmails"/>
      </fields>
      <conditions>
        <condition type="modelmerge" value="" field="genesis__Application__c" operator="=" model="TaskApplication" enclosevalueinquotes="true" mergefield="Id" novaluebehavior="noquery" state=""/>
        <condition type="fieldvalue" value="true" enclosevalueinquotes="false" field="SendUserNotificationEmails" operator="="/>
      </conditions>
      <actions>
        <action>
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="populateApplication"/>
          </actions>
          <events>
            <event>models.cancelled</event>
          </events>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </model>
  </models>
  <components>
    <pagetitle model="newTask" uniqueid="sk-3RQg75-81">
      <maintitle/>
      <subtitle/>
      <actions>
        <action type="multi" label="Save">
          <actions>
            <action type="save">
              <models>
                <model>newTask</model>
              </models>
            </action>
            <action type="custom" snippet="SaveTaskCreationDialog"/>
          </actions>
        </action>
        <action type="multi" label="Cancel" secondary="true">
          <actions>
            <action type="custom" snippet="CancelTaskCreationDialog"/>
          </actions>
        </action>
      </actions>
    </pagetitle>
    <basicfieldeditor showheader="true" showsavecancel="false" model="newTask" buttonposition="" mode="edit" layout="" cssclass="nx-basicfieldeditor-item-modify" uniqueid="task-creation-editor">
      <columns>
        <column width="100%" cssclass="">
          <sections>
            <section title="" collapsible="no" cssclass="nx-basicfieldeditor-item-modify" showheader="false">
              <fields>
                <field id="Subject" valuehalign="" type=""/>
                <field id="Description" valuehalign="" type="" displayrows="3"/>
                <field id="Priority" valuehalign="" type=""/>
                <field id="Type" valuehalign="" type=""/>
                <field id="OwnerId" valuehalign="" type="">
                  <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                </field>
                <field id="ActivityDate" valuehalign="" type=""/>
                <field id="genesis__Application__c" valuehalign="" type="CUSTOM" optionsource="model" readonly="true" optionmodel="Application" displaytemplate="{{Name}}" searchtemplate="{{Name}}" snippet="RenderApplicationId" cssclass="rendered-app-id">
                  <searchfields usesosl="false" soslfields="Name Fields"/>
                  <filters/>
                  <renderconditions logictype="and" onhidedatabehavior="keep"/>
                </field>
                <field id="SendUserNotificationEmails" valuehalign="" type="" readonly="true"/>
              </fields>
              <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
            </section>
          </sections>
        </column>
      </columns>
      <renderconditions logictype="and"/>
    </basicfieldeditor>
  </components>
  <resources>
    <labels/>
    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="staticresource" name="CLSNGUIComponent" cachelocation="false" url="" namespace="genesisExtn" filepath="messageUtils.js">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="populateApplication" cachelocation="false">(function(skuid){
   var $ = skuid.$;
    $(function(){
        var application = skuid.$M('TaskApplication');
        var applicationRow = application.data[0];
        var newTask = skuid.$M('newTask');
        var newTaskRow = newTask.data[0];

        newTask.updateRow(newTaskRow,{
           genesis__Application__c: applicationRow.Id,
           genesis__Application__r: applicationRow
        });
        // We need to go manually tell our Field Editor
        // to re-render its "genesis__Application__c" field.
        // Since a Field Editor registers itself as a List
        // on our newTask Model, we can do this
        $.each(newTask.registeredLists,function(){
            $.each(this.renderedItems,function(){
               $.each(this.fields,function(){
                    if(this.id==='genesis__Application__c') this.render();
               });
            });
        });
    });
})(skuid);</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="CancelTaskCreationDialog" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({iframeIds: []});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SaveTaskCreationDialog" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
	
closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({iframeIds: ['task-list-popover']});</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="RenderApplicationId" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;

$(params.element).text(params.row.genesis__Application__r.Name);</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css>
      <cssitem location="inline" name="RenderedApplicationId" cachelocation="false">.rendered-app-id .nx-field {
    margin: 0 !important;
    padding-top: 10px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
}
	      #task-creation-editor .ui-icon.ui-icon-search.nx-field-reference-search {
    /*line-height: 3;*/
    display:none;
}
	    
	    </cssitem>
    </css>
  </resources>
  <styles>
    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
  </styles>
</skuidpage>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="SelectFirstEntryInQueue" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;

$(function() {
    var pageInclude = skuid.$('#relationship-dashboard').data('object');
    pageInclude.load(function() {
        clickQueueEntry(true, sessionStorage.selectedPartyId);
    });
});

function clickQueueEntry(force, partyId) {
    sessionStorage.removeItem('selectedPartyId');
    if (partyId) {
        var clickIndex = 0;
        $.each(skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty').data, function(index, party) {
            if (party.Id === partyId) {
                clickIndex = index;
                return false;
            }
        });
        $($('#relationship-queue .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[clickIndex]).trigger('click');
    } else {
        if (force) {
            $($('#relationship-queue .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[0]).trigger('click');
        }
    }
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="AdjustLayoutRelationshipDashboard" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  $ = skuid.$;

if (sessionStorage.refreshParty) {
    sessionStorage.removeItem('refreshParty');
    var pageInclude = skuid.$('#relationship-dashboard').data('object');
    pageInclude.load(function() {
        clickQueueEntry(true, sessionStorage.selectedPartyId);
    });
} else {
    clickQueueEntry(false, sessionStorage.selectedPartyId);
}

function clickQueueEntry(force, partyId) {
    skuid.model.updateData([skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty')],function(){
        if (partyId) {
            var clickIndex = 0;
            $.each(skuid.model.getModel('DashboardParty').data, function(index, party) {
                if (party.Id === partyId) {
                    clickIndex = index;
                    return false;
                }
            });
            $($('#relationship-queue .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[clickIndex]).trigger('click');
        } else {
            if (force) {
                $($('#relationship-queue .nx-item.nx-queue-item')[0]).trigger('click');
            }
        }
    });
}</jsitem>
